source_objects.title: Leadership
source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.

items.title: Secrets To Becoming A Leader And Impress Your Friends
items.headline: How To Become A Great Leader
objectives_summary: What leadership is and isn't
Why leadership training should be important to you
Finding your inner leadership "kernels"

items.title: Behavioural Styles DISC/Insights Overview
items.headline: Recognising and understanding different Behavioural Styles
objectives_summary: This eLearning Module will explore different Behavioural Styles (DISC/Insights).  It will enable students to recognise the different styles, identify them in themselves and others, then explore how to work more effectively with each style. This course is perfect for anyone wanting to increase their level of influence and co-operation as well as increasing their own understanding of behaviour in general.

items.title: Mindful Business Leader Introductory Course for True Success
items.headline: You’re in a position to change the world. ​Make it count. Find real happiness and meaning in what you do.
objectives_summary: Understand your PURPOSE, your unique gifts and talents and how you can fully express them in the world
Develop a DECISION MAKING FRAMEWORK connecting you to your “wiser self”, cultivating lifelong inner knowing and a place of refuge during any challenge
Learn or deepen your MEDITATION and MINDFULNESS practice

items.title: How Smart People Deal With Difficult People
items.headline: Difficult people are everywhere. Perhaps you too can be difficult.
objectives_summary: Learn ways to confidently stand up to others and resist the urge to attack back
Deal with all kinds of difficult people – hostile, manipulative and the impossible
Understand what makes difficult people tick and how best to handle them

items.title: Getting ready for CPP  - Supplementary Questions (Difficult)
items.headline: Certified Protection Professional (CPP) is the 'Gold Standard' for Physical Security Professionals.
objectives_summary: By undergoing this course students will become familiar with the types of questions that can come up during CPP certification exam
Students will be exposed to technical questions relating to all aspects of Physical Security Operations
This test will also test students on several elements .......

items.title: 6 Traits of Executive You: Credible Leadership

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course is designed to grow the confidence, ambition, & strategic influencing skills of high-potential professional.
objectives_summary: Recognize the differences between managers and leaders, and explore how to let go of the manger mindset and become a leader.
Discover the leadership effect, and identify ways to measure the results of leaders and their importance to every organization.
Explore how to lead using your personal power in the absence of fancy job titles.

items.title: Leadership: The Art of Becoming a Great Female Leader
items.headline: Less turnover, positive work environment, high productivity and the fame of being a great leader!
objectives_summary: Become an inspirational leader.
Improve productivity in your staff.
Have higher retention rates and less turnover.

items.title: Finding Time
items.headline: How to Prioritize and Find Time for Employee Development.
objectives_summary: FourSquare priority matrix
11 time-finding strategies
How to be intentional in developing others

items.title: Management, Motivation and Communication at Business
items.headline: Lessons for Management, Motivation and Communication at Business
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn Management, Motivation and Communication in business life.

items.title: Secrets To Becoming A True Leader
items.headline: Mastering your leadership qualities
objectives_summary: How to achieve high results within your organization by learning how to set goals and achieve them
How to become an authentic leader that influences transformation and development
Top leadership strategies that are required for success

items.title: Coaching Others for Performance

visible_instructors.title: Stephen R Warner
visible_instructors.name: Stephen R
visible_instructors.job_title: Leadership and Sales skills Consultant - Global

items.headline: Improve your own results by helping others increase their performance. For Leaders and Managers and helping others grow
objectives_summary: How to be a great Coach when coaching is a part of your role, NOT your full-time occupation or vocation.
The critical Why, Who, What, Where, When and How of Coaching and the different ways it can be used to deliver the results you want. Coaching your Peers and your "Boss"!
How to establish and evolve an overall Coaching Process that earns commitment and supports other personnel development procedures

items.title: Intentional & Authentic Leadership
items.headline: Your Personal Strategy to Becoming A Better Leader
objectives_summary: This course will teach you different types of leadership styles.
Help you become aware of your style strengths and opportunities.
In this course you will create your very own personal leadership strategic plan.

items.title: Igniting Performance and Energy
items.headline: Creating Personal Transformation
objectives_summary: Igniting Performance and Energy will teach you how to create and sustain your best performance and most optimal energy.  It will give you visibility into the conditions under which you create great work and relationships. It will also help you understand how your strengths become triggered into weaknesses, and can actually sabotage your positive impact, energy, and performance.  You will create a specific plan of action to grow your energy and performance.

items.title: How to Master Public Speaking - The Art of Expression
items.headline: Be a Leader
objectives_summary: How to remove your Stage Fear and Hesitation
Conquer your speech Anxiety and Nervousness
Look comfortable, confident and relaxed in any speaking situation

items.title: Understanding the Basis of Behaviour
items.headline: Gaining insight into why people do what they do and how to use that understanding to increase your effectiveness
objectives_summary: This eLearning Module will explore the Basis of Behaviour.  If you have ever watched someone do something and been baffled by their behaviour, this module could provide rich insight into why people do what they do.  It also explores how to use that insight to enable us to interact more effectively with others, whether that is as a leader, manager, colleague, family member of friend

items.title: Public Speaking: Structure, Deliver And Engage
items.headline: Build Your Public Speaking Skills
objectives_summary: Improve Public Speaking
Speech Structuring
Speech Delivering
